name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama was in Hollywood for a star-studded fundraiser. They raised a million dollars and converted him to Scientology.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The president’s security left traffic in Los Angeles paralyzed. It took some people two hours to get home from work, when it usually only takes 96 minutes.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I don’t understand why the president has to drive. He could just flap his ears and fly anywhere.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Rod Blagojevich was convicted of only one of 24 counts against him: Transporting illegally silky hair across state lines.
